slides.title: Percentage Basics
slides.content:
**Meaning:** Per hundred (out of 100)
**Symbol:** %
**Convert to %:** Multiply by 100
**Convert from %:** Divide by 100
**Example:** 0.5 = 50%, 1/4 = 25%

slides.title: Formulas
slides.content:
**% of a number:** (x/100) × number
**Increase:** Original + (% × Original)
**Decrease:** Original - (% × Original)
**% change:** (Change/Original) × 100
